attributes.action: Bring back Boris Johnson as PM via vote of no confidence in current government
attributes.additional_details: Because Liz Truss is going to destroy the Conservative Party and Boris is the only man capable of sorting this mess out.  There’s no effective opposition because they’re run by a teapot
attributes.background: I want parliament to put a vote of no confidence in Liz Truss and then Boris be allowed to return as PM via an unopposed election

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or replaced.

In any case, decisions about changes to the leaders of political parties are a matter for individual political parties, not the UK Government or Parliament.
